posts.post_content:
I decided to be a copycat and follow Jay's lead by "striking while the iron is hot"!! :D  This splendid example (Ha! Ha!) of Hank O'Day - batting will be delivered expeditiously to the first collector who will give me $375 for it!!
Val

No Takers - I guess the iron got cold in a hurry!! :(

OK, I'm receptive to reasonable offers.  BTW, I do guarantee that this card will receive a numerical grade from either PSA or SGC.  Emails preferred to PMs.
Val
[url]ekehl333@aol.com[/url]
